description.narrative: An Phat Holdings Joint Stock Company (APH or the Company) is the parent company for a group of subsidiaries involved in: (i) manufacturing of biodegradable plastic products, plastic packaging and raw materials for plastics; (ii) manufacturing of engineering plastics for motorcycle and auto parts; and electrical and electronic components and molds for plastic industry; and (iii) development of industrial parks. APH has two main subsidiaries: An Phat Bioplastics Joint Stock Company (AAA) and Hanoi Plastics Joint Stock Company (Hanoi Plastics). AAA is one of Vietnams leading plastics packaging manufacturers and primarily produces plastic bags, both conventional and compostable bags, as well as industrial bags. APH was listed on Ho Chi Minh Stock Exchange on July 28, 2020 and had a market capitalization of US$414 million (as on Oct 16, 2020). The proposed IFC financing will support the implementation of a PBAT (polybutylene adipate terephthalate) plant with a capacity of 20,000 MT/year and PBAT compound plant with a capacity of 21,000MT/year (the Project). The PBAT compounds will be used as raw material by its subsidiaries, AAA and Hanoi Plastics, to produce compostable plastic bags and cutlery for both export and domestic markets.

The Project has an Anticipated Impact Measurement and Monitoring (AIMM) rating of Good. The most significant expected project-level outcomes are: (i) economywide and employment effects; and (ii) employee skills. Beyond the Project, IFC anticipates the potential to promote competitiveness and sustainability. The Project outcomes rating is Strong with Medium likelihood of achievement. The likelihood assessment is based on the Group's experience in in flexible plastic packaging the sector, demonstrated by having operated facilities with annual capacity of 96,000 tons. The Group is also largest player in the plastic packaging sector in Vietnam. The contribution to market creation rating is Strong with Low likelihood of achievement. The likelihood is based on the Company's leading position in the market, and as the first who produces compostable bags in Vietnam with scale and equipped with integrated operations.
